EmailTemplate.description: Send notification to customer whenever case status is set as Resolved.
EmailTemplate.name: Case Resolved Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Closing Ecolab Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for contacting the Ecolab Support Team. This message is to confirm that we have closed your case {!Case.CaseNumber} regarding {!Case.Subject} with the following resolution: {!Case.Resolution_Description__c}
To review the resolution and, if necessary, request that your case be reopened, please click the following link: {!$Label.Ecolab_Community_URL}{!Case.Id}
If you are unable to click the above link, please copy and paste it into your browser's address bar.
Thank you for being an Ecolab customer.
Best,
Ecolab Support Team
-----
Please do not reply to this email. This is a system generated email to inform you of updates to your Ecolab Case. This message was generated from https://connect.ecolab.com.
